snippet: Energy stocks rebounded from an early sell-off. Health care and consumer companies also posted gains.
abstract: Stocks rise briskly, led by climbing energy shares.
lead_paragraph: Energy stocks rebounded from an early sell-off. Health care and consumer companies also posted gains.

headline.main: Rally by Energy Shares Helps Dow Top 18,000
headline.print_headline: Rally by Energy Shares Helps Dow Top 18,000
